main_definition: A person who lives nearby, particularly in a community or residential area.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Someone living next door to you
meanings_and_examples.example: My neighbor helped me fix my broken fence.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A member of a local community with whom one may share common interests or resources
meanings_and_examples.example: We often organize neighborhood events together, as we are good neighbors to each other.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An individual living in close proximity, typically within the same residential area or street.
meanings_and_examples.example: When I moved into this new apartment, my first interaction was with my neighbor who welcomed me warmly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person with whom one can have social interactions due to their proximity
meanings_and_examples.example: As neighbors, we occasionally chat over the fence and look out for each other's properties.
